effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.

short_effect.sun-moon: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.
